definition: to play yabao (a gambling game)/(fig.) to gamble on/to take one's chance/to try one's luck
to mortgage/to pawn/to detain in custody/to escort and protect/(literary) to sign
jewel/gem/treasure/precious
variant of 寶|宝[bao3]

sentences.english: Eisenhower realized that he could not fail with highways.
sentences.chinese: 艾森豪威尔意识到他押宝高速公路不会输。

sentences.english: Which are you going to bet on?
sentences.chinese: 那么，你准备押宝哪一种？

sentences.english: It bet everything on two revolutionary technologies.
sentences.chinese: 它将一切押宝于两个革命性的技术上。

sentences.english: Now, the army is gambling on the liberal opposition for the same goal.
sentences.chinese: 如今，军方故技重施，押宝自由派反对者。

definition: to bet/to wager
variant of 押寶|押宝[ya1 bao3]
to work hard towards a turnaround/to fight to reverse sth
to stake all on one throw
to collapse (of plan, talks etc)
winner
to put one's all into the fight
to ratchet up/to raise (expectations etc)/to increase (a quota, a position in the market etc)/to up the ante/(computing) to encode
to burn joss paper/(fig.) to flush money down the toilet
game of chance/gambling party/gambling joint
to pour/to pour down (of rain)/to lay a bet
lit. to return to office after living as a hermit on Mount Dongshan (idiom); fig. to make a comeback
to bet/to gamble
to have a lucky stroke/to try one's luck
lit. a cup of soup/fig. to get part of the profits/one's share of the action
investment/to invest
